TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PreviousTrackingServiceAttribute extends System.Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Indicates the type of the that was used prior to the current version.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
When an assembly containing a new version of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> implementation is deployed, this attribute is applied to the new version of the tracking service class to identify the assembly of the previous version. This allows the runtime to utilize the newer tracking service for workflows that were using persisted while using the previous version of the tracking service, but resumed after the new version was implemented.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string assemblyQualifiedName) cil managed

Docs.param: A that contains a fully qualified assembly name that identifies the previous version of the tracking service.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
Gets the fully qualified assembly name of the previous version tracking service that this version replaces.
Docs.value: A containing the fully qualified assembly name.
